modName: Marauder Shields - A tribute to Mass Effect 3 hero
descriptionHtml:
HEAR ME! IF YOU ARE THESE WHO LICK BIOWARE ASS, EXIT THIS SITE AND GO FUCK YOURSELVES! NOBODY WANTS YOUR STUPID COMMENTS HERE!

Reapers invaded Skyrim! Nahkriin (the guardian of the beam to Sovngarde) has new name. Marauder Shields, the marauder guarding the beam.

It is a tribute for a hero, who died trying to save us from the ending of ME3.

Goals:
Marauder Shields saying: \"Do not play Mass Effect!\", \"You shall not pass!\" and \"I hold the line!\"
Marauder Shields ME3 texture
Marauder Shields\' note (a letter to the players)

The language on these pictures is Czech. It is language I use and I am particularly proud of it. 

Mods on the pictures:
Isilmeriel LOTR weapons: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5727
Order of the Stick followers (my mod): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14743
And others...(less important)
author: thepitchforkoffate
